summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Employee Time Tracking & Monitoring Software Phase 2 features. All new backend APIs (Projects, Tasks, Attendance, Shifts, Invoices) tested successfully. Frontend pages load correctly and integrate properly with backend. All navigation items present and functional.
passed_tests: API Health Check - API running correctly
User Registration - Creates user and company successfully
User Login - Email/password authentication working
Auth Me - User info retrieval working
Dashboard Stats API - Returns all required stats fields
Time Entry Creation - Start timer functionality working
Time Entries Retrieval - Fetches time entries correctly
Active Time Entry - Gets current active entry
Timesheet Generation - Creates timesheets successfully
Leave Request Creation - Creates leave requests
Leave Requests Retrieval - Fetches leave requests
Team Members Listing - Returns team member data
Company Settings Retrieval - Fetches company info
Timesheets Retrieval - Gets timesheet data
Projects CRUD - Create, Read, Update operations working
Tasks CRUD - Create, Read, Update operations working
Attendance Clock Operations - Clock in/out functionality working
Attendance Records Retrieval - Fetches attendance data
Shifts CRUD - Create, Read, Update operations working
Shift Assignments - Create and retrieve assignments working
Invoices CRUD - Create, Read, Update operations working
Frontend Login Page - Loads correctly with all elements
Frontend Navigation - All new menu items (Projects, Attendance, Shifts, Invoices) present
Frontend Projects Page - Loads with New Project and New Task buttons
Frontend Attendance Page - Loads with Clock In/Out functionality
Frontend Shifts Page - Loads with Create Shift button
Frontend Invoices Page - Loads with Create Invoice button and tabs
Frontend Clock In Functionality - Successfully clocks in user
Frontend Invoice Tabs - All tabs (All, Drafts, Sent, Paid, Overdue) clickable
Frontend-Backend Integration - Proper data isolation between users
